headline: Schlumberger Limited (SLB) Announced its Agreement to Acquire RESMAN Energy Technology
summary: Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is one of the Ridiculously Cheap Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 23, Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) announced its agreement to acquire RESMAN Energy Technology, which is a leader in wireless reservoir surveillance solutions. The company’s advanced chemical tracers track water, gas, oil, and CO2 in reservoirs with extreme precision and […]
